data.actual_result: It changes the first letter typed
data.expected_result: It should stay the original letter
data.short_description: Typing :[insertemojinamehere]: results in the first letter you typed being changed but only specific letters & I haven't tried all of them, i.e. :sn changes to :an. NB (s->a, h->b are known constants for me) NOT all letters do this. But s & h do.
data.steps_to_repro: - Type a message  - Add an emoji by typing i.e. `:snail:` reverts to :anail:
